__TOC__

This page describes some of the testing techniques and tools used to test ofono and the rest of the networking/telephony stack for Ubuntu Touch.

=== Touch Emulator ===

* install ubuntu-emulator ( used to create emulator instances )
** emulator instances created in ''./local/share/ubuntu-emulator''
** use ''--use-raw-disk'' to enable .img files ( specifically ''system.img'' ) to be updated
